sections.title: Student of Perfection (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Student of Perfection class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon Proficiency (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all weapons that have the monk special weapon quality.

sections.title: AC Bonus (Ex) (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: Provides a scaling dodge bonus to AC and CMD when wearing light or no armor, which is lost when immobilized, helpless, or encumbered.

sections.title: *Ki* Pool (Su) (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: Stacks with existing ki pool levels and grants ki strike abilities equal to class level, with Perfect Style adding Wisdom modifier to ki points.

sections.title: Martial Artist (Ex) (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: Stacks with existing martial artist abilities or grants flurry of blows and unarmed strike as a monk of equal level, counting as monk levels for feat prerequisites.

sections.title: *Ki* Powers (Su) (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: Grants selection of ki powers from unchained monk options or school-specific powers every 2 levels starting at 2nd level.

sections.title: Bonus Feat (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: Grants House of Perfection-specific combat style feats at 3rd and 7th levels without prerequisites, or allows selection from other class bonus feat lists.

sections.title: Perfection (Ex) (Student of Perfection)
sections.description: At 10th level, permanently increases one ability score of choice by 2 points.
